name: Filter Processor
description: Filters data packets satisfying a number of expressions.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the expression: 'groovy', 'negate' or 'simple'.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: The expression to evaluate, can be arithmetics, boolean logic and simple predicates like. Supported predicates are: containsField(field), which searches for the presence of a field -- isNumeric(field), which checks if the field is numeric -- isJson(field), which checks if the field is JSON -- isNull(field), which checks if the field is null -- containsJsonField(field,json.path.name), which checks if the JsObject in field contains the JSON path json.path.name -- isEmpty(), which checks if the datum is empty (ie. contains no keys).

parameters.name: batch
parameters.description: Whether or not to include the entire DataPacket if one or more of the elements match the expression(s)

parameters.name: batch_min_count
parameters.description: If batch is set to true, this number is the minimum amount of elements that should fulfill the expression(s)
